General.Name: Nanhua Bio Medicine Co Ltd
General.Description: Landfar Bio-medicine Co., Ltd operates as a biomedical technology company. The company operates through Biomedicine, and Energy Saving and Environmental Protection segments. The Biomedicine segment engages in the provision of stem cell storage and technical services; stem cell therapy research; medical device procurement and sales, etc. The Energy Saving and Environmental Protection segment is involved in the external energy management contract energy management business; build-transfer business and sales of related products; and sewage treatment business. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Changsha, China.
General.Address: Lugu Science and Technology, Changsha, China, 410205
